original_title: DIMO recognised for its transparency in South Asian business landscape
original_body_lines: DIMO continues to shine at a global scale clinching the Joint Gold Award in the Diversified Category, and another Gold Award for Integrated Reporting at the recent South Asian Federation of Accountants (SAFA) Best Presented Annual Report Awards, Integrated Reporting Awards, and SAARC Anniversary Awards for Corporate Governance Disclosures Competition 2022 showcasing its excellence in corporate reporting.  These accolades underscore DIMO’s dedication to setting new benchmarks in corporate reporting and contributing to a culture of transparency in the South Asian business landscape.
